title: Chicken Wing Shortage, It's Never Good, Snoop Dogg Good Hair and more.
itunes:title: Chicken Wing Shortage, It's Never Good, Snoop Dogg Good Hair and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Fool #2 starts off with a question about anniversaries. Fool #2 has bad math for you in Ask Bitterman. Dave Chappelle has an apology with a side of shade for the 'articulate' one. 1:30p EST is when it all goes down and the crew wonder what Derek Chauvin will get. According to Junior there is a new superstar in the NBA and he kinda look like a DeBarge! J. Anthony Brown has situations that are never good when somebody says....... The comedians on the show give us the ways you describe someone when you can't remember their name. Snoop admits that only one celebrity can smoke him under the table. The captain of Team Tommy ends the week with a question. "Why did the chicken cross the road?"

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Fool #2 starts off with a question about anniversaries. Fool #2 has bad math for you in Ask Bitterman. Dave Chappelle has an apology with a side of shade for the 'articulate' one. 1:30p EST is when it all goes down and the crew wonder what Derek Chauvin will get. According to Junior there is a new superstar in the NBA and he kinda look like a DeBarge! J. Anthony Brown has situations that are never good when somebody says....... The comedians on the show give us the ways you describe someone when you can't remember their name. Snoop admits that only one celebrity can smoke him under the table. The captain of Team Tommy ends the week with a question. "Why did the chicken cross the road?"
